title: Los Quetzales Eco Lodge
typeOfFood: Lacto, Pizza, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mountain lodge with a restaurant that is open to the public. Offers vegetarian with vegan options, and sells local organic chocolate and coffee. The vegetables and herbs are all organic, grown in its gardens, the bread is fresh baked, and dairy products produced by their own cows. Buffet breakfast is included in hostel price for staying guests. On the menu you will find curry, quinoa, wraps, burritos, lasagna, pizza, hummus.
